contentrichtext.text: '''Fort Niagara State Park''' is located in the [[Porter, New York|Town of Porter]] in [[Niagara County, New York]], USA. Historic [[Fort Niagara]] is located within the park. The park is northwest of [[Youngstown, New York]] near the northern terminus of the [[Robert Moses State Parkway]]. The park offers picnic tables and pavilions, hiking, a playground and 18 soccer fields, a pool, recreation programs, a nature trail, tennis, sledding, snowshoe trails, cross-country skiing, waterfowl hunting in season, fishing and a food concession. There are two boat launches on the lower [[Niagara River]]. The park includes the Old [[Fort Niagara]] Historic Site. [[Tom Loftin Johnson]] Johnson painted five murals at ''The Officer's Club'' which commemorate the history of the 28th regiment from its founding in 1905.<ref name = "fort">[http://info-poland.buffalo.edu/exhib/murals/Grill.html The Officers Club], at Fort Niagara State Park, accessed December 2011</ref> During the summer, a state park naturalist provides nature programs, trail hikes and manages the natural history exhibits in the park's nature center.<ref>http://www.dec.ny.gov/education/1846.html Fort Niagara State Park Nature Center</ref> ==See also== * [[List of New York state parks]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://nysparks.com/parks/175/details.aspx New York State Parks: Fort Niagara State Park] * [http://exploreamericasparks.org/ny/fortniagara/vt/ Virtual Tour of Fort Niagara State Park] * [http://books.google.com/books?id=yt8DAAAAMBAJ&pg=PA867&dq=Popular+Science+1935+plane+%22Popular+Mechanics%22&hl=en&ei=gdhATrWrH8qhsQLUgbXcCQ&sa=X&oi=book_result&ct=result&resnum=5&ved=0CD0Q6AEwBDgU#v=onepage&q=Popular%20Science%201935%20plane%20%22Popular%20Mechanics%22&f=true "The FORT of FOUR Nations" ''Popular Mechanics'', December 1934, pp.867-869] {{coord|43.262|-79.055|type:city_region:US|format=dms|display=title}} {{Protected Areas of New York}} [[Category:State parks of New York]] [[Category:Robert Moses projects]] [[Category:Parks in Niagara County, New York]] [[Category:Nature centers in New York]] {{NiagaraCountyNY-geo-stub}}
